de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics.pipeline

Class CombinedRenderPipeline

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics.pipeline.CombinedRenderPipeline
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, RenderPipeline, Resizeable

    public class CombinedRenderPipeline
extends Object
implements RenderPipeline
    Combined implementation of RenderPipeline. This pipeline will bake together all layers and apply shaders for all layers underneath: 
     {layer1}{layer2}{layer3}{end-layer3}{end-layer2}{end-layer1}
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miguel Gonzalez Sanchez
